text: Study Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it.
Settle||Your people have a new home.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Collect Tithe & Occupy||You gain wealth from the tithe, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Cleanse with Fire||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your people here.

Demand Offerings||You do not capture the settlement but instead take offerings in the form of gold and damage buildings. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
